reviews.review_msg: Cliff is a tough grader but it is evident he really cares about his students. Make sure you pay attention and ask questions! He is very friendly one-on-one so don't be afraid to see him during his office hours.

Very bad notes he made for students. You cannot catch up with the lecture content without reading the text book throughly. He cannot give clear rules and answers for his questions on his slides. Not recommend this course if you want to have high GPA or don't have enough time for this course.
